title: Colin Cowherd’s Instant Reaction - Packers/Bills SNF + Week 8
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd’s Instant Reaction - Packers/Bills SNF + Week 8
description:
Colin gives his instant reaction to the Bills win over the Packers, the major weakness that could cost Buffalo a Super Bowl, and if Green Bay still has a shot at making the playoffs. He also looks at Christian McCaffrey’s seamless transition into the Niners offense, and Kenny Pickett’s alarming comments about the Steelers lack of offensive preparation.

Follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates, check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action, and visit Cuts for the latest Fall fits! #Herd #Volume

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
